description:
Versatility never looked so great. With the Mountain Light Triclimate Jacket, you get three options. Option 1 is a durable waterproof shell. It's smartly featured with handwarmer pockets, underarm zips and an adjustable storm hood to seal out the wind and rain. Option 2 is an insulated liner jacket that retains heat but is light and compressible. And Option 3 is zipping them together to create the ultimate cold-weather system for hiking, skiing or making it through whatever rain hammered, wind-blasted situation you're in.

  • Outer shell is constructed from waterproof breathable 2-layer Gore-TEX™ and has taped external seams for ultimate weather protection
  • Shell and liner can be worn together, or separately
  • Inner liner jacket uses light and efficient 550-fill-power down insulation
  • 3-piece storm hood on shell is adjustable with a stiffened brim
  • Underarm pit zips on shell offer instant ventilation
  • Yoke and hem are made with WindWall™ fabric to stop wind in its tracks
  • Adjustable cuffs keep the warm in and the cold out
  • Zippered hand pockets on shell and liner jacket
  • Liner jacket has an internal zippered chest pocket
  • Standard fit offers no surprises, just comfort
name: The North Face Mountain Light Triclimate GTX Jacket - Men's
